com.hms_networks.americas.sc.azure.config

Class AZConnectorConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hms_networks.americas.sc.config.ConfigFile
      • com.hms_networks.americas.sc.azure.config.AZConnectorConfig
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AZConnectorConfigCert, AZConnectorConfigSAS

    public abstract class AZConnectorConfig
extends ConfigFile
    Configuration class containing generic configuration field methods that are applicable to both SAS token and Certificate provisioning modes.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    HMS Networks, MU Americas Solution Center

    • Method Detail

      • getAzureDeviceMode

        public AZConnectorDeviceMode getAzureDeviceMode()
                                         throws JSONException
        Get the configured Azure Device Mode from the configuration. If an unknown device mode is specified, this method will return AZConnectorDeviceMode.UNKNOWN.
        Returns:
        Azure Device Mode
        Throws:
        JSONException - if unable to get Azure Device Mode from configuration

      • setAzureDeviceMode

        public void setAzureDeviceMode(AZConnectorDeviceMode deviceMode)
                        throws JSONException
        Set the Azure Device Mode in the configuration.
        Parameters:
        deviceMode - Azure Device Mode
        Throws:
        JSONException - if unable to set Azure Device Mode in configuration

        JSONException - if unable to get connector log level from configuration
